title: Error Metadata
description: Metadata for an error. Can be associated with one or more methods that belong to one or more APIs of the same namespace.

id.description: Human-readable, unique identifier of the error. You can use error code or error name as identifier.

message.description: Message describing the error. Should be localized based on locale. It is recommended that this value be streamed out in error response as error.json#message.

log_level.description: Log level associated with this error. This MUST NOT be streamed out in error responses as well as exposed in any external documentation.

http_status_codes.description: Applicable HTTP status codes for this error.

items.description: Unique identifier for an api using this error.

actions.description: Suggest actions that the developer of application consuming the API could take in order to resolve the error condition.

links.description: Error context specific HATEOAS links. Corresponds to error.json#links
